hadis: The best of believers is the one who has the best character.
Make things easy, do not make them difficult; give good tidings, do not make people hate.
A smiling face is charity.
He who does not show mercy will not be shown mercy.
Allah is Beautiful and loves beauty.
Cleanliness is part of faith.
Spread the Salam (greeting of peace).
He who does not show mercy to our little ones is not one of us.
When you love a believer brother, tell him.
Believers love one another, have mercy on one another, and protect one another.
Religion is ease.
A good word is charity.
Allah loves the one who acts gently.
A believer is the one from whose hand and tongue people are safe.
The best of people is the one who is most beneficial to people.
Allah helps the one who helps his brother.
One good deed is recorded as ten times its value.
Allah is with those who are patient.
Exchange gifts, love one another.
He who does good to his neighbor has beautified his faith.
Making a believer happy is charity.
Allah is Forgiving and loves forgiveness.
Give charity even if it is with a single date.
Whoever shows ease, Allah gives him ease.
Good behavior is part of faith.
Allah loves gentleness and does not love harshness.
Every act of kindness is charity.
Show ease to people.
A good word illuminates the heart.
Greeting your believer brother with a smiling face is charity.
A believer is a mirror to a believer.
Do not condemn your believer brother so that Allah protects you.
Allah has mercy on those who have mercy on people.
Have mercy on your young ones, respect your elders.
The heart of a believer is soft.
Relieving a believer's distress is a great kindness.
A believer is patient and compassionate.
Allah loves those who repent.
Whoever is humble, Allah raises him.
The love of believers is bound to one another.
Allah does not look at your appearance but at your hearts.
If gentleness is in something, it beautifies it.
Faith is good character.
Allah gives ease to the one who shows ease.
Allah is the One who desires mercy for His servants.
Your smiling at your believer brother is charity.
Mercy is a part of faith.
A believer is nourished with lawful provision.
Allah loves the one who does his work consistently.
A believer desires for his brother what he desires for himself.
Allah conceals the servant who keeps secret what He dislikes.
Whoever makes a believer happy, Allah makes him happy.
Believers are like one body; if one part suffers, the others feel it too.
Do good to people so that you may see goodness.
Good character is the heaviest thing on the scale.
Allah facilitates for the one who shows ease.
Praying for your brother is charity.
A believer is gentle-natured, he does not get offended and does not offend.
Allah loves beautiful behavior.
Every work done with sincerity is blessed.
A believer does not harm another.
A Muslim is the one from whom people are safe.
Allah takes care of the affair of the one who meets the need of his brother.
Allah loves the one who does his work soundly.
How beautiful a friend, how beautiful a companion is a believer.
Whoever speaks a good word, charity is written for him.
A believer is tolerant; forgiving is greatness.
Allah loves His servants with clean hearts.
The one with good character is close to Paradise.
The one who shows ease to people finds ease.
Allah endears the servant He loves to the hearts of people.
Allah protects the one who protects a believer brother.
A believer avoids anger, chooses patience.
Whoever is far from arrogance, Allah raises him.
The believer's word is beautiful, his heart is soft.
The reward for the one who does a kindness is kindness.
Whoever prays for his brother, the angel says 'Amen'.
Allah divided mercy into one hundred parts; He gave one part to His servants.
Gentleness increases beauty.
Good behavior exalts a person.
A believer wishes goodness for his brother.
Allah loves those who are clean.
Tolerance brings blessing.
The patient one wins.
When a believer is loved, he is humble.
Allah loves the servant with a beautiful face and beautiful speech.
Smiling at a believer is charity.
Allah rejoices at His servant's repentance.
Whoever forgives, Allah forgives him.
A believer is good-natured, gives hope to people.
Faith is to facilitate and to do good.
Allah loves to have mercy on His servants.
Mercy beautifies the heart.
A believer keeps his promise.
Whoever wins a heart, Allah wins his heart.
Allah loves deeds done with good intention.
A believer does not hurt anyone with his hand or tongue.
Every smiling face is a kindness.
Allah is very gracious to His humble servants.
A believer desires for his brother what he desires for himself.
Allah desires for His servants not to sin but to be forgiven.
A good word refreshes the heart.
A believer does not hurt others, even if hurt he is patient.
Allah loves the good intention of His servant.
A believer is one who gives peace; one is comfortable next to him.
Whoever meets the need of a believer, Allah meets his need.
Allah loves His servants who show mercy.
Praying for a believer brother is kindness.
Hearts soften with good words.
Whoever encourages goodness becomes a partner in goodness.
Allah multiplies and beautifies kindness.
A believer lives with truthfulness.
Your smiling at your brother is kindness.
Patience is light.
Allah loves His servants with clean hearts.
A believer is not heartbreaking.
Forgive so that you may be forgiven.
Allah blesses the work of the one who does kindness.
A believer does not tire out hearts, he wins hearts.
Whoever makes another happy, Allah makes him happy.
Allah loves the one who acts with gentleness.
A believer is smiling.
Whoever approaches people with mercy, Allah has mercy on him.
Truthfulness brings peace.
Allah loves His good-hearted servants.
A believer supports the broken-hearted.
Kindness increases beauty.
Allah loves His patient servants.
A believer covers the fault of his brother.
Mercy is the ornament of hearts.
Allah does not let even the small kindnesses of His servant go to waste.
A believer does not hurt, even if hurt he is patient.
Truthfulness leads to beauty.
Allah loves His servants who love one another.
Good character beautifies the believer.
Whoever forgives, Allah raises him.
A believer races in kindness.
Repelling evil with good is beauty.
Allah puts love into the hearts of His servants.
A believer becomes hope for people.
The best of you is the one with the best character.
Allah loves His humble servants.
The one who shows mercy finds mercy.
A good word brings hearts closer.
A believer is forgiving.
Whoever facilitates, Allah gives him ease.
One who does good finds good.
Allah loves beautiful behavior.
A believer is beautiful with his heart, tongue, and behavior.
Allah's mercy is close to those who are gentle.
A believer observes truthfulness in every task.
Allah loves kindness, does not love evil.
Whoever lightens the burden of a believer, Allah lightens his burden too.
A believer shows ease to others.
Allah raises His humble servants.
Kindness is good character.
A believer is beautiful with his heart and tongue.
Whoever mends a heart, Allah mends his heart.
Patience is half of faith.
Allah loves His clean-hearted servants.
Mercy is the ornament of the heart.
A believer loves his brother and does not harm him.
Whoever affgives, Allah forgives him.
A good word unites hearts.
Allah is the One who desires mercy for His servants.
A believer is smiling, gives peace to his surroundings.
Facilitate for your brother.
Tolerance increases beauty.
Allah loves His patient servant.
A believer is exalted by covering the fault of another.
Whoever is a means to a kindness, its reward is with him.
Allah loves the one whose heart is clean.
A believer is not heartbreaking, he repairs what is broken.
Love is a grace from Allah to His servants.
The rank of the one with good character is high.
Allah loves the one who does his work beautifully.
The one who shows mercy finds mercy.
A believer gives peace with his heart and state.
Whoever behaves beautifully receives a beautiful reward.
Allah loves to forgive His servants.
A believer does not break anyone, and repairs the broken.
Allah loves good intention.
The heart of a believer is soft.
Whoever wins a heart has done a great kindness.
Allah loves mercy.
A believer does not tire of forgiving.
Beautiful behavior brings peace.
Whoever intends kindness earns reward.
Allah puts love into the hearts of His servants.
A believer loves his brother and prays for him.
Whoever provides ease to another, Allah provides ease to him.
Mercy is the light of hearts.
Allah loves a clean heart.
Good character beautifies the believer.
A believer increases kindness by speaking good words.
Allah loves His forgiving servant.
A believer is a source of peace for people.
Whoever works with good intention finds blessings.
Allah supports those who are patient.
A believer wishes for the goodness of his brother.
A believer loves to give greeting (Salam) and spreads it.
Allah accepts good intention.
Whoever makes his believer brother happy earns reward.
The rank of the one with good character is high.
Allah loves the one who acts gently.
A believer is the one who is beneficial to people.
Forgiving is beauty.
Allah loves the good word.
A believer shares the trouble of his brother.
A smiling face is charity.
Whoever does kindness finds kindness.
Allah's mercy is vast.
A believer does not speak bad words.
Beautiful behavior brings peace.
Allah loves what is clean.
The one who shows mercy finds mercy.
A believer prays for his brother.
Patience is beauty.
Allah accepts even small kindnesses.
A believer provides ease to his brother.
Good character beautifies the believer.
Allah endears the servant He loves to the hearts of people.
Work done with sincerity is blessed.
A believer is beautiful with his heart, tongue, and state.
Whoever wins a heart has done a great kindness.
Allah loves deeds done with good intention.
A believer harms no one.
A good word illuminates the heart.
Allah is forgiving, loves forgiveness.
A believer becomes beautiful with patience.
Whoever facilitates, Allah gives him ease.
Mercy is the ornament of the heart.
Allah loves a clean heart.
A believer is smiling.
One who does kindness finds kindness.
Allah puts love into the hearts of His servants.
A believer covers the fault of his brother.
Tolerance brings blessing.
Allah loves those who are patient.
The heart of a believer is soft.
A good word is charity.
Allah loves His servants who show mercy.
A believer is gentle-natured.
Whoever makes a believer happy, Allah makes him happy.
Good character is from faith.
Allah loves His humble servants.
A believer lives with truthfulness.
The one who shows mercy finds mercy.
Allah loves the one who does his work beautifully.
A believer wishes kindness for his brother.
A believer is good-natured, he does not break and is not broken.
Allah loves cleanliness.
Whoever speaks a good word has given charity.
A believer is gentle towards his brother.
Allah loves good hearts.
Beautiful behavior is the sign of faith.
A believer unites hearts.
Allah loves those who show mercy.
Whoever makes a believer happy earns reward.
Good is heard from the believer's tongue.
Whoever forgives, Allah forgives him.
A good word unites hearts.
Allah loves His patient servants.
A believer prays for his brother.
Kindness increases beauty.
Allah loves the one who does his work beautifully.
A believer gives peace with his heart.
Mercy is the ornament of the heart.
Whoever facilitates, Allah gives him ease.
A believer wins hearts, does not break hearts.
Allah loves His humble servants.
A believer is truthful.
Whoever intends kindness earns reward.
Tolerance brings blessing.
A believer loves his brother and prays for him.
Allah loves a clean heart.
Good character is from faith.
A believer covers the fault of his brother.
One who does kindness finds kindness.
Allah treats with His mercy.
A believer is not heartbreaking.
The one who is patient reaches beauty.
Allah loves good intention.
A good word is charity.
A believer is soft, not harsh.
Whoever wins a heart, Allah loves him.
Allah loves forgiveness.
A believer does not harm his brother.
Allah places love into the hearts of His servants.
The heart of a believer is soft and he loves softness.
Kindness beautifies the heart.
Allah loves His patient servant.
A believer wishes goodness for his brother.
Beautiful behavior brings beauty.
Allah responds to good intention.
A believer does not hurt anyone.
The one who shows mercy finds mercy.
Allah loves truthfulness.
A believer is good-natured.
A good word brings hearts closer.
A believer gives peace to others, finds peace.
Allah loves beautiful behavior.

A believer is forgiving.
Allah loves the one who does kindness.
A believer lightens the burden of his brother.
Allah loves clean hearts.
Kindness leads to beauty.

Allah loves His servants who show mercy.
A believer is soft with his heart.

The rank of the one with good character is high.
Allah loves forgiveness.

Allah loves good intention.

Allah loves the one who does his work beautifully.

Good character completes faith.

Allah loves good hearts.

Whoever wins a heart has done a great kindness.
Allah treats with His mercy.
A smiling face is beauty.
A believer is the one who is beneficial to people.
Allah loves what is right/truth.
The one who shows mercy finds mercy.
A believer is beautiful with his heart, tongue, and state.
The reward of the one with good character is great.
The heart of a believer is soft, it does not hurt.
Allah loves mercy.

Allah loves the one who does his work beautifully.
Tolerance increases beauty.

Allah loves clean hearts.
Hearts are in the hand of Allah; He directs them as He wills.
Kindness beautifies the heart.
Allah loves His patient servant.
A believer seeks good in every matter.
Allah's mercy is close to those who have soft hearts.
